title: Porque Firefox presenta tantas problemas con la paginas de google.com- google.co.cr
content: Firefox presenta muchos problemas con lo que son las paginas de google.com- google co.cr entre otras ya que presenta un error de HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) por otro lado presenta demasiado retraso en la carga de paginas y a perdido mucha productividad y rendimiento en firefox
creator: oscarjackson997

title: Internet connection problems while using Firefox
content:
Hello, I have problem in firefox or programs when I use firefox, some examples:

1. When I having a class using Zoom.exe and open a firefox windows, while browsing in firefox, I lose the zoom connection, just when using firefox, I need to close firefox to reconnect to zoom. 2. Same when playing an online game like rocket league, I lose steam connection.

When I close firefox this problem no longer happens
creator: alekfer75

title: Firefox constantly unloading tabs
content:
For about..hmm... I'm not sure how long. At least a couple months, Firefox has been acting very strange. Before christmas I did a reset on firefox to clear up some issues. I don't run very many add-ons. I use moderator toolbox for reddit, ublock origin, and a "view image" add-on to add the "view image" option back into google images.

That's it.

I've had all of those for much longer than this problem has existed.

I checked browser.tabs.unloadOnLowMemory and it's set to false.

I have 32 gb of ram and my ram is nowhere near being fully used.

What I'm seeing is that if I have 4 or 5 tabs open, going back to a reddit or youtube tab that I always have open results in that tab being unloaded and having to wait while it reloads the tab.

I also notice from time to time that middle clicking something to open a link in a new tab results in the browser jamming up from anywhere from 1-3 seconds.

Used Firefox for years and never seen any kind of issue like this before. I used to be able to easily open 20-30 tabs if I was going through google search results to try and find some information and never had any problem.
creator: crossmr

title: Migrate bookmarks

title: Firefox crashes and restart issues
content:
Two problems:

1. Every time I close my FF browser, I get a crash report dialogue. Is there a fix for this?

2. When I attempt to restart FF, I'm prompted to close FF or cancel. Why?
creator: rjahnkow

title: Am I able to sync browsing history between iOS and Windows?
content: I visit a webpage on iOS, then click the sync button on both iOS and Windows, but I don't see the webpage on my history on Firefox for windows.
